random.content: When a man is penalized for honesty he learns to lie.
random.author: Criss Jami

random.content: You are not the drop in the ocean, but the ocean in the drop.
random.author: Deepak Chopra

random.content: Don't let your learning lead to knowledge. Let your learning lead to action.
random.author: Jim Rohn

random.content: Failure is just information and an opportunity to change your course.
random.author: Oprah Winfrey

random.content: If no one ever broke the rules, then we'd never advance.
random.author: Simon Sinek

random.content: He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe.
random.author: Marcus Aurelius

random.content: An idea that is developed and put into action is more important than an idea that exists only as an idea.
random.author: Buddha

random.content: Experience is not what happens to a man. It is what a man does with what happens to him.
random.author: Aldous Huxley

random.content: Nothing could be worse than the fear that one had given up too soon, and left one unexpended effort that might have saved the world.
random.author: Jane Addams

random.content: There is no fear for one whose mind is not filled with desires.
random.author: Buddha

random.content: The constant assertion of belief is an indication of fear.
random.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

random.content: The chief danger in life is that you may take too many precautions.
random.author: Alfred Adler

random.content: No one ever said life was fair. Just Eventful.
random.author: Carol Burnett

random.content: Even the finest sword plunged into salt water will eventually rust.
random.author: Sun Tzu

random.content: The more you are focused on time - past and future - the more you miss the Now, the most precious thing there is.
random.author: Eckhart Tolle

random.content: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
random.author: Dalai Lama

random.content: The difference between treason and patriotism is only a matter of dates.
random.author: Alexandre Dumas

random.content: Where we fall are the stepping-stones for our journey.
random.author: Lolly Daskal

random.content: You live by what you thrill to, and there's the end of it.
random.author: D. H. Lawrence

random.content: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
random.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

random.content: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.
random.author: Henry David Thoreau

random.content: There will always be suffering. But we must not suffer over the suffering.
random.author: Alan Watts

random.content: It is the power of thought that gives man power over nature.
random.author: Hans Christian Andersen

random.content: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
random.author: A.A. Milne

random.content: A path is made by walking on it.
random.author: Zhuangzi

random.content: An inch of time is an inch of gold but you can't buy that inch of time with an inch of gold.
random.author: Chinese Proverb

random.content: Change the changeable, accept the unchangeable, and remove yourself from the unacceptable.
random.author: Denis Waitley

random.content: You can't let your failures define you. You have to let your failures teach you.
random.author: Barack Obama

random.content: You can suffer the pain of change or suffer remaining the way you are.
random.author: Joyce Meyer

random.content: Forget mistakes. Forget failure. Forget everything except what you are going to do now and do it. Today is your lucky day!
random.author: Og Mandino

random.content: Old age is like everything else. To make a success of it, you've got to start young.
random.author: Theodore Roosevelt

random.content: None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free.
random.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

random.content: The strength of a wall is neither greater nor less than the courage of the men who defend it.
random.author: Genghis Khan

random.content: I pay attention to every minute of the day.
random.author: Steve Harvey

random.content: Take time like the river that never grows stale. Keep going and steady. No hurry, no rush.
random.author: Rumi

random.content: It is best to begin at the beginning.
random.author: Amelia Earhart

random.content: If you want to be successful, find someone who has achieved the results you want and copy what they do and you'll achieve the same results.
random.author: Tony Robbins

random.content: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
random.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

random.content: Life is but one dream flowing into another.
random.author: Ming-Dao Deng

random.content: The first principle of success is desire.
random.author: Robert Collier

random.content: Here is the test to find whether your mission on earth is finished. If you're alive, it isn't.
random.author: Richard Bach

random.content: You are a function of what the whole universe is doing in the same way that a wave is a function of what the whole ocean is doing.
random.author: Alan Watts

random.content: Enthusiasm makes up for a host of deficiencies.
random.author: Barack Obama

random.content: Life reflects your own thoughts back to you.
random.author: Napoleon Hill

random.content: Most of the important things in the world have been accompanied by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
random.author: Dale Carnegie

random.content: Dream big. Start small. But most of all, start.
random.author: Simon Sinek

random.content: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken
random.author: Oscar Wilde

random.content: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
random.author: Wayne Dyer

random.content: A man with outward courage dares to die: a man with inner courage dares to live.
random.author: Lao Tzu

random.content: Being in humaneness is good. If we select other goodness and thus are far apart from humaneness, how can we be the wise?
random.author: Confucius

random.content: Libe
random.author: me

random.content: Your visions will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
random.author: Carl Jung

random.content: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
random.author: Tony Robbins

random.content: The more often a stupidity is repeated, the more it gets the appearance of wisdom.
random.author: Voltaire
